episodes.title: Two Sisters Raised In Cult School (Our Story)
episodes.description:
My sister and I retell our story of being raised from a young age in a live-in cult school and share our thoughts about it in hindsight. This school indoctrinated us with the teachings of the Unification Church movement. This video was made from a place of compassion and love for Unification Church members and to give them a message of hope that is found in the message of the gospel. 

Link to my testimony: https://youtu.be/c8v32Icfic8?si=EH32NNDDhmN5rzxs

episodes.title: From Korean Cult to the real Jesus
episodes.description:
Here's a link to my sister's testimony: https://youtu.be/KPailZfdBQw 

In this video, I briefly review my life's journey to finally finding the truth that is Jesus Christ. I was a broken, confused, and lost person who was set free by the transforming power of Christ...the real Jesus not the one I was taught about in the Korean cult aka Unification Church I was raised in. This upbringing led me to a path of depression, confusion, and addiction. If you are a member of this cult otherwise known as the Unification Church and have questions I would tell you there is a reason for your doubt and to lean into those questions with everything you have in you. I pray this video speaks to you by way of the Holy Spirit and He can move you to cry out to Him to break the chains of being a slave to sin.

 I did not create this video to attack, criticize, or show hate for anyone. I did this because as a follower of Christ, I am to obey His word as He tells me in the bible to expose the darkness and deception in this world in whatever form it may take.  Ephesians 5:11 "Have no fellowship with the fruitless deeds of darkness, but rather expose them."

Edit: Just to clarify when I say "completed testament" I am referring to the views of Unification church members NOT me or any other bible believing Christian.
